betterquesting:10.desc:8:
Just like the Abyss, L'Borean holds a deep connection with one, or more, of the Elder Ones.
The sleeping city of R'lyeh, a plane of existance even deeper than Omothol, seems to merge with thre three 'normal' dimensions of space here in L'Borean.
The gatekeepers of this world are located here, and guard it with all their might. This does not eman I can take something from them, though.
If the Old Ones are so good at gathering intelligence, anything I take from them must be valuable to someone, right? Right?
